parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the group to which the API belongs.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries returned per page.

parameters.name: StageName
parameters.description:
The environment in which the API is running. Valid values:

*   **RELEASE**: production
*   **PRE**: staging
*   **TEST**: test
